task.Question: In the video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L1vXCYZAYYM, what is the highest number of bird species to be on camera simultaneously?

Annotator Metadata.Steps:
1. Navigate to the YouTube link.
2. Watch the video to see the highest number of bird species.
3. Note the number.

steps.content: In the video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L1vXCYZAYYM, what is the highest number of bird species to be on camera simultaneously?

plan: Access the video at the provided YouTube link.
Watch the video carefully to identify scenes where multiple bird species appear on camera.
Count the number of different bird species visible in each scene.
Determine the scene with the highest number of bird species visible simultaneously.
Record the highest number of bird species observed in a single scene.

given_facts: The video is located at the URL: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L1vXCYZAYYM.
facts_to_lookup: The highest number of bird species visible simultaneously in the video.

steps.subtitle_text:
00:00:00.000: But one challenge stops them in their tracks.
00:00:10.000: A giant petrel.
00:00:16.000: They try to flee, but running isn't an emperor's strong point.
00:00:22.000: A slip is all the petrel needs.
00:00:30.000: The chick is grabbed by his neck feathers.
00:00:34.000: But the down just falls away.
00:00:41.000: They form a defensive circle and prepare to stand their ground.
00:00:48.000: Despite their chick-like appearance, they are close to a metre tall.
00:00:54.000: Quite a size, even for a giant petrel.
00:01:00.000: The chick towers to full height, protecting those behind.
00:01:06.000: His defiance buys time.
00:01:13.000: It's a standoff.
00:01:14.000: Then, as if from nowhere, an Adeli, the feistiest penguin in the world.
00:01:26.000: He fearlessly puts himself between the chicks and the petrel.
00:01:35.000: Even petrels don't mess with the delis.
00:01:39.000: Their plucky rescuer accompanies the chicks to the sea.
00:01:40.000: The fair.
00:01:41.000: The fair.
00:01:42.000: The fair.
00:01:43.000: The fair.
00:01:44.000: The fair.
00:01:49.000: The fair.
00:01:50.000: accompanies the chicks to the sea.
00:01:54.000: Fair.

steps.overview: The video shows scenes with multiple bird species, including emperor penguin chicks and a giant petrel.
